duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze and evaluate data in one or more specialty areas including, business operations, processes, budgets, and financial systems.
Prepare financial reports, technical report writing, monitoring budget, maintaining records, analyzing data, and developing budget forecasts.
Interact with internal and external customers using both verbal and written communication skills to discuss financial processes or issues.
Work with both external and internal auditors on financial requests.
Implement and maintain internal financial controls and measures.
Have knowledge of state and federal laws, rules, and regulations.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED in general field of study (Master’s Degree in business, or related field of study preferred)
